title: SA5
longDescription: What if you want your frontend to have routes — different URLs that map to different components and layouts of components? We’re going to add React Router to our starterpack so all your future projects can have it!

steps.title: Route Setup
steps.content: Setup three different routes to display a Welcome, About, and Test components

steps.title: URL Parameters
steps.content: Lets add support for parameters in our urls so our component can get some more info about the url we're on

steps.title: Unknown Routes
steps.content: Create a Fallback component that will be displayed whenever we are taken to an unknwon route

steps.title: Desployment
steps.content: Deploy our new site using surge so it can be viewed by everyone and graded
